snippet: The Supreme Court of the United States should broadcast its hearings live. Adding video would enhance public understanding of the court.
abstract: Editorial holds the United States Supreme Court should follow the Supreme Court of Britain in allowing its proceedings to be televised; asserts that there is no cause to think that live broadcasts will diminish the dignity of the court, and that video would enhance public understanding.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court of the United States should broadcast its hearings live. Adding video would enhance public understanding of the court.
